modName: Basvanbeus Mesh and Texture Changer Version 2
summary: An NPC Body mod that separates all the playable races and gives each unique meshes and textures

files.name: MTC_Version2
files.changelogHtml:
Separated the races so that all can use unique meshes and textures
4 different texturesets possible depending on weight of NPC
